a.title: Legend for this format

title.value: Cross-version Extension `R5.PaymentReconciliation.allocation` for use in FHIR R4

description.value: This cross-version extension represents the FHIR R5 element `PaymentReconciliation.allocation` for use in FHIR R4.

purpose.value:
This extension is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the element `PaymentReconciliation.allocation` as defined in FHIR R5 in FHIR R4.
The source element is defined as: `PaymentReconciliation.allocation` 0..* `BackboneElement`
Across FHIR versions, the element set has been mapped as: * R5: `PaymentReconciliation.allocation` 0..* `BackboneElement` * R4B: `PaymentReconciliation.detail` 0..* `BackboneElement` * R4: `PaymentReconciliation.detail` 0..* `BackboneElement`
Following are the generation technical comments: Element `PaymentReconciliation.allocation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `PaymentReconciliation.detail`, but has no comparisons.

Element `PaymentReconciliation.allocation.target` has a context of PaymentReconciliation.detail based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `PaymentReconciliation`.
